name: Magic Dice
description:
Created for GMTK2022 jam  with theme "Role of the Dice" 

Small pixel art platformer where you need to piñata The Dice to roll you some points and progress thru the levels in complete chaos of the surroundings witch may or may not affect your performance .  Everything is dictated by The Dice or is it.  I hope you will enjoy this little game.

Rate the Game

Controls are:

 "Arrows" to move

 "Space" to Jump

 "C" to attack 

All of art work and code is done by me. Credits to Zasplat.com for soundefxs and OpenGameArt for music.
